wybug_title: TOM在线某站存在SQL注入漏洞
wybug_status: 漏洞已经通知厂商但是厂商忽略漏洞
wybug_detail:
漏洞详情 披露状态：   									2015-10-19：	细节已通知厂商并且等待厂商处理中									2015-10-24：	厂商已经主动忽略漏洞，细节向公众公开  简要描述：  详细说明：  
POST /en/UI/Candidate/RetrieveCandidatePassword.aspx HTTP/1.1Content-Length: 498Content-Type: application/x-www-form-urlencodedCookie: ASPSESSIONIDSSBBACTB=NBOJKCOBBJKKBPCCLAMKNGDC; ASP.NET_SessionId=sh5qblf0zs1ht355wxhr5j45; Lingo=zh-CNHost: 2030rx.tom.comConnection: Keep-aliveAccept-Encoding: gzip,deflateUser-Agent: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 6.1; WOW64) AppleWebKit/537.21 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/41.0.2228.0 Safari/537.21Accept: */*btnSubmit=Retrieve%20Password&txtLoginEmail=111&__EVENTARGUMENT=&__EVENTTARGET=&__EVENTVALIDATION=/wEWAwK/%2bKDCCQKUpea7AwLCi9reAxa2sohy%2bNYkq4GeiFYFrfZ9mPz0&__VIEWSTATE=/wEPDwUJNDA2NDE0NDI0D2QWAgIBD2QWAgIBD2QWAgIFDxYCHgRocmVmBRIvZW4vVUkvVGVtcGxhdGVzLyMWAmYPDxYEHgRUZXh0ZR4HVmlzaWJsZWhkZGTypNs/%2bdieBxMObxcMLr1GBfZaZA%3d%3d
注入点：txtLoginEmail参数

wybug_reply: 漏洞回应  厂商回应： 危害等级：无影响厂商忽略 忽略时间：2015-10-24 16:06 厂商回复：  漏洞Rank：4  (WooYun评价) 最新状态： 暂无
